data.name: plNameDisplay.Help
data.value: This is the format the sites users will appear to users of this forum module.

data.name: plAutoLockTrust.Help
data.value:
If checked, only administrators and not moderators can change the status of a user's trust level for newly created forum users.
NOTE
User trust level locking is controlled on a per users basis.

data.name: plEnableHTMLSignatures.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be permitted to use HTML code in their signatures.

data.name: plEnableModSigUpdates.Help
data.value: If checked, moderators will be able to update users signatures from the user profile area viewable by all users.

data.name: plEnableUserBanning.Help
data.value: If checked, administrators and moderators can ban users from posting.

data.name: plEnableUserSignatures.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to add a custom signature to their profile in the forum module. This will display in all posts as well as the users profile.

data.name: plPostEditWindow.Help
data.value: The number of minutes, users are able to edit a previously posted item. (0 minutes for indefinitely)

data.name: plUserReadManagement.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be permitted to mark all threads as read and also clear read status of all thread items. When unchecked, users will not see these links (ie. so community activity reporting can factor in thread reads).

data.name: plAutoTrustEnabled.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be trusted after they meet the Auto Trust threshold setting.

data.name: plAutoTrustTime.Help
data.value:
The number of posts required before auto trust kicks in (if enabled). For example, if this number is set to 10 after the untrusted user has their 10th post approved they will automatically have their trust status changed and their 11th post will go unmoderated (provided they have no other posts already in the queue).
NOTE:
Setting this to 0 will automatically trust new users.
